name: Chocolate Hummus
author: Yoly
summary: Hummus for dessert? So delicious and full of chocolate, no one will ever know you made it with garbanzo beans! Try it with fresh fruit, cookies, crackers or even by the spoonful!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
2 tablespoons maple syrup, or to taste
2 tablespoons almond milk, or more as needed
directions: Place chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl and heat in the microwave until melted, 1 to 3 minutes
Combine melted chocolate chips, garbanzo beans, cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and salt in the bowl of a food processor
Add almond milk 1 tablespoon at a time while blending to desired smoothness
